title: Creamy vegetable stew
ingredients: ['3 litres water', '8 large potatoes, peeled and sliced', '4 large carrots, diced', '2 sticks celery, chopped', '2 small onions, chopped', '75g butter', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/4 teaspoon paprika', '500ml double cream']
